availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Row Lucas in Ohio County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1849. Father of Mary E. Lucas, Thomas Lucas, William Lucas, and Florence Lucas. Tavern keeper in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Officer in McLean County in 1860. Sheriff of McLean County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 226B-227A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 9.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 438.
"Henry Lucas (1815-1879)," Find A Grave, Memorial #82245193, accessed August 14, 2020http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82245193.
KYR-0001-004-0306.
